name: Firefox - Smaller toolbar size in Linux
description: This style makes the ridiculously huge Firefox UI in Linux a lot smaller and compact, similar to how it looks by default in Windows. I use Ubuntu 12.04 Unity with the default Ambiance theme so it should look relatively similar to everyone who has a similar setup as me. Just play with the margins and heights in the CSS if it doesn't look right to you.
additional_info:
2012.07.22
-----------
Added styling for pinned tabs
Fixed bookmark bar margins to work with the default Ubuntu themes Ambiance and Radiance.
